author: John (NOT REAL NAME)
title: John (NOT REAL NAME)
text: I got the Quote: and sent the book properly and then got an email that I have not sent the exact book, so I am not able to receive the money as Quote: d ($8.50) and I should get only $1.30. I have never seen the book they were claimed to be sent by myself. Also they said I have to give $3.99 shipping fee I want to get back the book. IT'S A FRAUD WEBSITE. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME
